snippet: Ryan Newman grabbed the lead when an accident took out the leaders with two laps to go, and he ended a 22-race winless streak by holding on in a Sprint Cup race at Martinsville (Va.) Speedway.
abstract: Ryan Newman wins Goody's Fast Relief 500 auto race at Martinsville Speedway in Ridgeway, Va; other auto racing news noted.
lead_paragraph: Ryan Newman grabbed the lead when an accident took out the leaders with two laps to go, and he ended a 22-race winless streak by holding on in a Sprint Cup race at Martinsville (Va.) Speedway.
